MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL38 postcode area of Fairbourne, affecting properties in Penrhyn Drive, Talbot Road and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:02pm on 12th November 2020
